com.zoolife.model

Class Zoo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zoolife.model.Zoo

  • public class Zoo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds information about (1) the set of animals in the Zoo, (2) the set of friendships among these animals, and (3) the set of friendships that were established/broken up during the last simulated day.

    Other than maintaining and retrieving these records, the main function of this class is to ensure the structural integrity of the friendship network in the zoo. For example, it ensures that if animal A becomes friends with animal B, then B becomes also friend with A. Alternatively, to take another example, the “Zoo” class ensures that friendships are established only among animals that are already in the zoo.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tarek Oraby
    See Also:
    Animal, AnimalFriendship, ZooKeeper

    • Constructor Detail

      • Zoo

        public Zoo(java.util.Set<Animal> newAnimalsSet)
        The constructor
        Parameters:
        newAnimalsSet - The animal set of the zoo
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if a null object was passed as the zoo's animal set or if a null object was passed as one of the zoo's animals
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the animal set is empty

    • Method Detail

      • addFirendship

        public void addFirendship(Animal anim1,
                          Animal anim2)
        Adds two animals as friends and updates the sets that reflect the daily changes in the zoo's friendship network. Note that the incrementDay() method must be called once before Friendships can be added
        Parameters:
        anim1 - animal friend number one
        anim2 - animal friend number two
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either of the passed two Animal objects are null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either of the two animals doesn't belong to the zoo or if the two animals are already friends
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if incrementDay() was not called at least once before the call to this method

      • areFriends

        public boolean areFriends(Animal anim1,
                          Animal anim2)
        Parameters:
        anim1 - animal friend number one
        anim2 - animal friend number two
        Returns:
        return true if anim1 and anim2 are friends
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the two animals don't belong to the zoo

      • getAnimalFirends

        public java.util.Set<Animal> getAnimalFirends(Animal anim)
        Parameters:
        anim - the animal whose friends' Animal objects are retrieved
        Returns:
        the set of anim friends

      • getAnimalFriendsGained

        public java.util.Set<Animal> getAnimalFriendsGained(Animal anim)
        Parameters:
        anim - the animal whose today's gained friends are retrieved
        Returns:
        the set of animals with which anim has established a new friendship today

      • getAnimalFriendsLost

        public java.util.Set<Animal> getAnimalFriendsLost(Animal anim)
        Parameters:
        anim - the animal whose today's lost friends are retrieved
        Returns:
        the set of animals with which anim has broken up its friendship today

      • getAnimalsSet

        public java.util.Set<Animal> getAnimalsSet()
        Returns:
        the set of zoo animals

      • getDailyFriendsAdded

        public java.util.Set<AnimalFriendship> getDailyFriendsAdded()
        Returns:
        the set of animal friendships that were established today (i.e. the ones that didn't exist in the previous day)

      • getDailyFriendsRemoved

        public java.util.Set<AnimalFriendship> getDailyFriendsRemoved()
        Returns:
        the set of animal friendships that don't exist today (but which existed in the previous day)

      • getDayCount

        public int getDayCount()
        Returns:
        the current day in the zoo (initialized with 0 and increments by one per ZooKeeper's simulation)

      • getFriendsNames

        public java.lang.String getFriendsNames(Animal anim)
        Parameters:
        anim - the animal whose friends' names are retrieved
        Returns:
        a comma delimited string of anim's friend names (ordered alphabetically)

      • getFriendsNumber

        public int getFriendsNumber(Animal anim)
        Parameters:
        anim - the animal whose number of friends are calculated
        Returns:
        the number of anim current friends in the zoo

      • getFriendsSet

        public java.util.Set<AnimalFriendship> getFriendsSet()
        Returns:
        the set of the zoo's current animal friendships

      • getZooProperties

        public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getZooProperties()
        Returns:
        The properties of the Zoo animals both individually (their names, favorite food, etc.) as well as in terms of Friendships (who's friend with whom).

      • incrementDay

        public void incrementDay()
        Increments the day count by one. This method also resets the AnimalFreindship sets that are necessary to keep track of the daily changes in of the zoo's social network

      • removeFirendship

        public void removeFirendship(Animal anim1,
                             Animal anim2)
        Breaks-up the friendship of the specified two animals and updates the sets that reflect the daily changes in the zoo's friendship network.
        Parameters:
        anim1 - animal friend number one
        anim2 - animal friend number two
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if anim1 or anim2 is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either of the two animals are not part of this zoo or if anim1 and anim2 are not friends in the first place
